data.title: Foundation blindekuh
data.meta_description: blindekuh Foundation: Inspired by an enlightening vision. The charitable blindekuh Foundation fosters dialogue and mutual understanding between sighted people and those with impaired vision. For this purpose, it develops and supports projects that create jobs for blind and partially sighted people. The blindekuh Foundation is one of Switzerland's main employers for this section of the population.
data.text:
The charitable blindekuh Foundation fosters dialogue and mutual understanding between sighted people and those with impaired vision. For this purpose, it develops and supports projects that create jobs for blind and partially sighted people. The blindekuh Foundation is one of Switzerland's main employers for this section of the population.

The most important project initiated by the Foundation is the popular blindekuh restaurant in the dark, with branches in Zurich and Basel. The Foundation has been honoured with numerous international awards for this groundbreaking concept.
